name: Ken Forsythe
text: We have a Mellow Mushroom your house and we are frequent visitors. This one has the same menu, and if you know the chain at all you will find it very familiar here. ‚Ä¶More

name: April Lawrence
text: The food was good. No complaints there. There are two complaints. One was we had to wait over an hour and we would have waited longer if I didn't go back inside and asked about our table. The service was terrible. The waitress never came back for refills or anything else

name: Matt Gates
text: I really like the food at Mellow Mushroom but getting my order correct is another story.  We vacation at Hilton Head and we don't have one of their stores near us so this is the only time we eat here.  We ordered the friends and family ‚Ä¶More

name: Greta Koning
text: No. Do not go here if you expect for them to comply with the mask mandates of the island. The only reason I gave it two stars is because the pizza was very good. I went to get takeout from here and my pizza was supposed to be ready at 8. It ‚Ä¶More

name: Amanda Walsh
text: Just a big Mellow Mushroom fan, period. The pizza was way to done here though, bit disappointing but overall it was great!

name: Daleen Spradlin
text: We‚Äôve come to this location many times.  Many times we order from there twice during the week.  Tonight was one of the worst experiences I‚Äôve ever had at any restaurant and after all was said and done, no one ever apologized.  We ordered ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Starnes
text: Mellow Mushroom is probably the best pizza we have had. This is where my son asked to go on his birthday. All the other pizza places are just okay in my opinion, but Mellow Mushroom takes first place.

name: Katrina Stenta
text: Great food. Burger was great and a good size. Daughters French bread pizza was really cheese and yummy

name: Aaron Smitley
text: Ignore the low star reviews. Pizza was perfect, definately in the top 3 I‚Äôve ever had. Staff was friendly. Music was great too. Pretzel bites are good too.

name: timothy petrie
text: Great staff and inside outside dining options, but you come here for the awesome pizza and pretzels. My kids love it, my wife and I love it. High quality food and fantastic topping options. No brainer place for family dinner.

name: Christina Secrist
text: Enjoyed lunch near Coligny Beach area,  patrons are set apart from other parties for dining due to social distancing, which is comforting. Great pizza is what we have come to expect from the many Mellow Mushroom's we have patronized over the years. Service was great and overall a wonderful time with our family while vacationing.

name: Maschaieternal Kerosathos
text: Mellow mushroom is a greedtastic overpriced chain restaurant you can buy a steak next door at harristeeter and get a better deal

name: Tommy Thompson
text: We order 2 Hawaiian calzones and a Hawaiian pizza  and they were all good, waitress was fantastic  !!!

name: Jenny Reese
text: Placed an order for takeout tonight. Upon arrival back to the hotel room, my husband discovered, that there was no chicken on his salad (it was supposed to be a double amount of grilled chicken). Called to see how can they fix it. No ‚Ä¶More

name: Topher Ellis
text:
Great, really tasty House pizza.

-1 star for absurdly overly-loud tv sound, and a lack of ambar and Octoberfest beers on tap.

name: vashonia kelly
text: The place was great!! Staff was pleasant which made my experience a good one. I  would rate it as a 4 1/2 because of my personal preference of a  thin crust pizza and the topping on the pizza(large tomatoes, prefer chopped). The pizza had a good flavor and I would be back if I lived nearby.

name: Ryan Horstman
text: Ordered a two topping small pizza and it was delicious. The taste was top notch and so was the service.

name: John Kaminski
text: The Shitake pizza is one of the best!!! The Avocado sub is a favorite as well! The staff is always friendly. We visit this location atleast once a year.

name: Greg Pufahl
text: I gave it two stars and not less because the food was very good. However we waited well over 1 hour for our food... and this was after we had ordered. So we were probably there without food for close to 1 1/2 hours or more.  There were ‚Ä¶More

name: sheri tucker
text:
The food was good but it seemed like the restaurant was really full.  Not sure what % the restaurants are allowed to be at now.
I did not see anyone sanitize the menus before they were redistributed to customers.  Would think that would be mandatory during this pandemic.

name: Andrew Peterman
text: Loved the beverages and food. Thanks for a great time.

name: Lisa Smith
text:
This is the best place for pizza or any other of their menu items
Just delicious!!!

name: Madison
text: All of the food was delicious and the staff was friendly. We ordered a calzone (huge!) and a vegetarian sub with spinach artichoke dip. We will definitely be coming again!

name: John Halter
text: Great food and drinks. Nice beer selection. They had bingo which was fun. Decor is unique and fun. Wait staff was great. Good pizza and sub wasn't that bad either.

name: Justin
text: Very fast service and friendly staff. I highly recommend the Greek salad and "Veg Out" pizza.

name: Greg Rudell
text: Allows smoking at outside bar around tables of people trying to eat. Enough said.  Oh - but don‚Äôt forget to wear your mask when you enter.  I guess smoking and 2nd hand smoke hasn‚Äôt killed as many people as covid.

name: Jason Harden
text: Discovered Mellow mushroom several years while traveling and now we always check to see if it is available. The Hilton Head island location wasn‚Äôt nearly as good as the many other locations we have tried. Service was non existent and the ‚Ä¶More

name: Patrick Lindstrom
text: Brutus Salad was skimped compared to the salads served in atlanta. We Ordered takeout and they let our order get cold instead of letting us know our order was ready, and didnt give us any silverware for the salad. Sloppy.

name: James Brown
text: If your in the mood for pizza I'd choose mellow mushroom.  This chain pizzeria is known for its dough and this site also makes use if some great local brews and island atmosphere.   Family friendly and right outside the main gate of sea pines, this restaurant is perfect for dine in or take out.

name: Brendan Holthaus
text: All of the workers wore their masks under their noses and took them off completely away from customers, but were a mere foot away from other staff. Obviously they don't take the health and safety of the staff or customers seriously.

name: Faithfully Blessed
text:
HILTON HEAD ISLAND is GREAT!!
Mellow Mushroom...
DEFINITELY THE WORST EXPERIENCE during my Birthday weekend!!! ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Muhich
text: First time eating here, and it was a free breakfast for going on a vacation tour.  I had the blueberry waffles and bacon and my wife had the quiche with potatoes.  Everything was good, not great.  My waffles came out luke warm; they would have been better if they came out hot.  Staff was very cordial.

name: Cody Frost
text: Mellow Mushroom has the best Pizza in the area. The employees are attentive. The Boyce family has made a fun environment for everyone! 10/10 would recommend to anyone!

name: Frank Wickstead
text: Wait 2 hours for then amazingly mediocre cold pizza? Maybe other raters are a bit more mellow than me.

name: Brett
text: Overcharged for vegan items when I left more off the original sandwich then I left on. Happened twice at this location. They got the sandwich wrong two times and didnt even offer to take it off the bill. Unethical business and the food ‚Ä¶More

name: Juanita Cowden
text: $30 for a large pizza. Order was incorrect. Veggies were raw.

name: Tony Perry
text: Friendly staff.  The outdoor area, where we sat, has a bar, many tables, a fireplace and a couple sofas.   There are a number of fans to move air on hot days.  Luke, our bartender, was great. We ordered the meatball trio from the appetizer offerings. They were quite good.

name: Kenyon Strother
text: Had an amazing breakfast at Mellow Mushroom Hilton Head Island! Thank you Palmera for treating your property owners so well!

name: Rob Flask
text: Pie was  great as always.  Got carryout.

name: Frank Acosta
text: Great pizza better satff! Chase is the man!

name: Candela_ Miami
text: Food was really good. Tortilla soup, calzone, and avocado hoagie. The white sangria was perfect. Everything tasted just-made and delicious. Nice atmosphere and decor. 80's music was on point and not loud. I'm giving them for stars because they took too long to give us the menu and the food took a bit long to come out.

name: L. Wilson
text: We've been on a tour of Mellow Mushrooms - having beer and pretzels. They're incredible. Actually, the server at this location was disengaged. But pretzels were awesome as always. Best pretzels though were in Wilmington NC - that guy was a pretzel artist.

name: Jim Rogers
text: Awesome pizza. We have been to a few different ones and they were all very good.  Decor is interesting.  Highly recommend.

name: Lisa Richardson
text: I was a little disappointed tonight. Food was good. We wanted to sit outside and enjoy the beautiful weather.  There were two guys smoking at the bar even though it said No Smoking. We asked the girl and she said she didn't know what the ‚Ä¶More

name: Shirley West
text: Very nice people and nice place to eat breakfast

name: Jerri Pautler
text: Variety of items not just pizza. Great salads!

name: RR
text: Great tasting pizza.  Service was a 2 star. Waiter never came back to get us drink refills

name: richard walters
text: Mellow mushroom has the NFL football package so most Sundays I like to visit the Mushroom, have a beverage or two and watch football. Plenty of tv's to catch the game on. Also the second best pizza on the island (my wife's is the best pizzas on the island).

name: Betty Hornsby
text: Good pizza with crispy crust.

name: Bailey Adkins
text: Horrible experience.  Would have been better going to a gas station.  At least there I would have gotten decent service.  Will not be returning any time soon.

name: Elizabeth Orsini
text: Place is unbelievable if you're from Atlanta or elsewhere pizza hand tossed in front of you fresh ingredients  Pizza voted #1 on hilton head island Atlanta 10 years running

name: Brooke Messenger
text: Great pizza and definitely try there sweet Asian wings. So good!

name: Bill McMann
text:
Just ordered tonight for take out a thin crust with
Pepperoni and Italian sausage. Just ate a piece. No cheese to speak of. Truthfully not as good as a frozen pizza except this cost $20. Could of been the maker. ‚Ä¶More

name: SteveAlicia Risko
text: Very good pizza and great service!

name: John Sanker
text: Good service and food.  We got there early with a party of 8 and were seated promptly even though it was the week of the 4th of July which is a crazy time on the Island.  Staff was friendly and attentive.   Loved the garlic pretzel knots with beer cheese and the artichoke dip.  We'd go back.

name: Jim C
text: Just went there on June 5 and one of the line Cooks came out of the bathroom without washing his hands with gloves on and went right to the line and started cooking with the same gloves on. Gross!

name: D Something
text: I would vote three and a half stars if I could. The Maui Wowie was excellent and the drinks on tap were pretty good too. The only downside was the service, probably because I was dining alone. I‚Äôd definitely visit again though.

name: John Kirkwood
text: Hailey was a great waitress.  The food was good and the crust was spot on.

name: MsSouthCaro
text: Amazing food.  My top 2 Mellow Mushroom spot. Clean and good service.

name: Derek Archer
text: Good atmosphere and inviting food with friendly service.

name: Charles Creger
text: enjoyed the white pizza and the mighty meat pizza. Service was great but the TVs were a little loud. Of course there was a big football game on but the place was practically empty on a Monday night.

name: olivia shidler
text: Great pizza but the slices are huge

name: Lee Southard
text: Great food and good friendly service

name: Yolanda Townsend
text: Everything was delish.

name: steven anderson
text: Great food. Patio was nice since our dogs joined us on our trip.

name: Tyee Crenshaw
text: Food and service was amazing

name: Jason Faulk
text: Awesome service and great food.

name: Florian Emmerich
text: Love it, just great Pizza. You have to love Parmesan to go there, smells all over.

name: Robert Flitcraft
text: Nice local bar and great appetizers

name: Eileen Harrell
text:
They have a great happy hour. $4.00 for 2 slices of cheese pizza. Great wings and drink specials. Great pizza too. For a reasonable great place try it. You won't be disappointed
.

name: Aron Duquette
text: Awesome people here. Awesome environment as well. The food was amazing, and they were very helpful in accommodating our large family group. Very fun experience! ‚Ä¶More

name: Brandy Hicks
text: Great. Also met a family with a special needs teenage child because he had thrown a napkin or something.  Bless that family of great people. I had wonderful conversation with them.

name: ERIN Chable
text: Always love the mellow. Had the kosnic carma with jalapenos! Oh yeah! Small salads are enough to share!

name: Duncan Butler
text: The food was good and the service was ok, our  bill was 42 dollars I put 60 in and waited and waited and waited on our server to return with the change but the server said she forgot we needed change, we were in on a monday night and it was fairly slow so we wondered if we were tipping for several tables...????

name: Deidra McKay
text: I came here excitedly with my mom, niece and daughter. When we entered, there was no greeting and no one was attending the stand in the front. We decided to sit and wait. While we were waiting, an older caucasian couple came in the door. As ‚Ä¶More

name: Madelyn G
text: Hands down this is the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had! I definitely recommend going if you are in the area. The only reason I gave 4 stars was because the wait was long to get my food, but I think it‚Äôs just because it was really busy.

name: Matthew Walent
text: Delicious, friendly staff.

name: dylan mcdowell
text: Every time I go to a Mellow Mushroom I'm reminded of why I I don't go. This one was okay...The service was not good, and the pizza was only so so. I believe I'm done with Mellow Mushroom.

name: Lawrence Nieves
text: Can't go wrong with Mellow. Great location and open late in a town that really sleeps. The service was a little slow, but for a great long-form pizza experience, Mellow is the way to go.

name: Jim Gudknecht
text: Great place

name: Becca Richison
text: Great pizza, but the service is poor. Me and my friends go here often and the waiters and waitresses are always slow and rarely check on our table do see if we need anything.

name: John Klosner
text: The food is good, I think it's just another sports bar, with expensive food.

name: Dave Kelly
text: I'd bring my dog, my ex girlfriend, and my future girlfriend patience....have a heart during the season because this place will be packed and you will wait for food. Free tip, won't cost you anything. Just chill out. Enjoy the fact your on the south end of HHI

name: Lisa Gerteis
text: Pizza was fresh and delicious!

name: Buffie Still
text: Wonderful pizza and environment.

name: Melissa Richmond
text: My family visit HHI every year and this is a stop we HAVE to make. Food is always great and the service is always top notch. Everyone is so friendly.

name: Bri Stenta
text: Excellent pizza and service! Our pizza came out with the wrong sauce, but the chef knew immediately and already started making us another pizza! He also bought us a round of drinks; which was beyond generous and appreciated. Thanks so much for an incredible lunch. We will certainly be back. üòÄ

name: Logan Laizure
text: My personal favorite pizza. A billion options, great staff.

name: Your Hiness
text: What a great place, wasn't too busy, service was amazing, food was on point! This place plays an awesome play list rocking Beatles and various Pink Floyd amoungst other mushroom inspired hits! Great drink variety and beer menu to satisfy ‚Ä¶More

name: mary hendy
text: Great food and service üòÅ

name: David Hummel
text: Like the locations in the Triangle of NC, Mellow Mushroom always has good pizza.  We tried the house special pizza today and it was awesome!!

name: Carolyn Zerbe
text: I try to get to a mellow mushroom any time we are down south. We always get amazing food and amazing service. Try the mushroom pizza, and the soft pretzels. Yum.

name: Keith Nelms
text: Food ok. Server disinterested.

name: Jonas Rubright
text: Server was very scattered but ok. And apparently the kitchen stops serving salads at 10pm?.? Pizza was good though, as expected.

name: Val√©rie Loiret
text: The great white with thin crust is just a must, nice seating outside patio

name: Spencer Ford
text: Awesome Zaaas. Great beer selection!! And the owners are awesome

name: John T
text: Typical bar food and a good draft selection.

name: tates boy
text: The pizza was delicious, including a gluten-free pie. We were pleasntly surprised when our server made us a new pizza because ours didn't fit his standards. The service was slow-southern, but it didn't affect our experience. Our kids loved the bocce ball and corn hole games.

name: Denisha Muhich
text: The pizza was tasty! Fast service.

name: Terry Shaw
text: The vegan options for pizza were very good.  The crust was tasty (the gluten free crust was pretty good too).  The seitan is an inspired addition to the toppings menu (it was fantastic).  The only surprise was how quickly the price grows ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Dilley
text: Great food, fun atmosphere

name: Roni Penner
text: This place has some of the cleanest restrooms!! Friendly staff and great food!

name: Molly Smith
text: Always delicious! Clean place and great service!

name: Jacob Gerber
text: Always good

name: Michael C
text:
Reasons to go: kid friendly...trying to think of another....oh, if it's late on HHI and you are really hungry.
Don't go here if you have ever had good pizza  in NY, Chicago,  etc. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brayden VanWyk
text: awesome food. very good.

name: Carlos Vargas
text: This is by far THE BEST pizza on the island. Lots of great choices and salads to choose from.

name: Justin Everett
text: Always love the Mellow Mushroom pizza.

name: Matt Biek
text: Great menu. The crust is so tender! And a beer selection I haven't seen since being in GR

name: Christy McKinley
text: I always love Mellow Mushroom. The service was great and the food was amazing!

name: Randy Adams
text: Very interesting place to eat. Large variety of menu items, and also drinks. Outside games to keep the younger crowd occupied.

name: R
text: Excellent pizza. Great service. Good drinks. The best mushroom soup I've ever had. This is a great place; I highly recommend it.

name: Danielle Swafford
text: Staff was good but the food wasn‚Äôt

name: Susan Eliot
text: Great food. Too bad they were more interested in take out orders.  Service was very slow

name: Noel Reese
text: Just way too expensive for what you get. The food is not worth the price. You're better off ordering from a chain and making your own alcholoic beverages at home. I hate to say that...

name: TC R
text: House special pizza was excellent.  Great selection of craft beers on tap.

name: Seth Kuyper
text: Great atmosphere and friendly people.

name: Michelle Jacobs
text: Love the Kosmic Karma pie.

name: Christopher Larkby
text: If I had to guess I would say they have over a hundred different beers available at any time.  They also have a beer club.  Probably a couple dozen televisions with different sports offerings on each screen.  Indoor seating in cozy booths. ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Danella
text: Great food,but the staff makes it great..not to be missed. Full bar and lots of fun in an exciting atmosphere. Sports everywhere.

name: Karen Anderson
text: Hunter is the Very best,  nicest youngman ever!

name: Sandie Parrott
text:
Always love their gluten free pizza! Wish it was thicker! Friendly staff!
We go there often and especially for the University of Michigan games!
GO BLUE! ‚Ä¶More

name: Jancyn Hill
text: On vacation, the food was fantastic. Busy during dinner rush but got seated quickly. Waited 15 minutes to get drinks and our waitress struggled to keep our drinks filled. We ordered an appetizer that came out with our pizza. Waitress disappeared many times. Appeared to be understaffed and most were in high school.

name: Douglas H
text: Employees and atmospphere 5 stars. Pizza  was adequate but not what I would call extraordinary compared and being from NY

name: Richard Anderson
text: Just love the food and friendly service.

name: Mark Stephens
text: Pizza was cooked great and tasted pretty good.  Thanks!

name: MGM
text: We played trivia here.  It was loud.  There were teams in every direction so it was impossible for the host to know if they were using their phones.  The pizza was fine but a tad expensive.  I'm not sure if I would repeat the experience.

name: Ethan Darion
text: Food was good. However, service was horrible. The girl hosting was extremely rude. She rolled her eyes when I asked for a seating for seven and when I asked to sit outside she literally threw the chairs in with the two tables she placed in ‚Ä¶More

name: m marin
text: delicious as always

name: Chris Cain
text: Excellent pizza!!!

name: Shirley Jo Dutton
text: The beer selection is amazing and the food is awesome!!!

name: shannon imm
text: What a fun evening instead of cheese we had 3 yummy toppings too. Was a hit with the two of us

name: Bob Wanat
text: Excellent specialty pizzas and good burgers too. But avoid the Caesar salad which was very bland with lousy parmesan cheese slices and stale croutons.

name: Regina Dawson
text: Excellent pizza, beautiful and creative restaurant with lots of activities for the kids while we waited for our order. Love it!

name: Jason Geer
text: Always delicious pizza and incredible service!

name: Leslie Millett
text: Very slow service. We were seated very quickly, but it took the waiter a very long time to come take our drink orders and an even longer time to take our pizza order. The pizza is made to order so it takes a long time to make. We were ‚Ä¶More

name: Julie Roehrenbeck
text: Good food, slow service

name: Amanda
text: Great atmosphere, good food

name: Greta Conley
text: First time I have had mello mushroom but it was amazing pizza!!

name: Bruce Hodson
text: Great pizza and had bingo while we were there also.

name: Fitness Lady
text: Actually had breakfast at this location. It was good. The potatoes were cold & the waitress was a seemed to not be bothered by our concerns.

name: Charles Griffin
text: Food was good but the waitress was having a bad day!

name: David Albu
text: Best pizza from Ohio to South Carolina!

name: Mike Gurdak
text: First off, the server was on top of things, then they have many, many beers to choose from. Salad and pizza was great! Our new "go to"!!

name: Julianna Cline
text: FANTASTIC SERVICE!! The wait staff is super friendly and always helpful. Ask for Jacob as your server or bartender, and he'll take great care of you! Never thought a margarita at a pizza place would make my top 5 favorite margs, but they make a mean one that's for sure! Highly recommend!!

name: Andrew Crowell
text:
This place does not deserve to bear the Mellow Mushroom name.

We waited close to an hour for our food. Our waitress never gave any updates or ‚Ä¶More

name: Don K
text: Great place to get a pizza and watch a game on one of there many TV's. It convenient since it is right outside the Sea Pines gate.

name: Marcia Siedliski
text: Pretty good breakfast, great coffee, good service

name: C. Andrew Byrd IV
text: Always a favorite when we visit HHI.  The pizzas are very large but are also a little pricey (its usually worth it though).

name: Stephen Fitz
text: Great food...but waited over an hour for food.  Table next to us was served in 15 mins???

name: Donald McLane
text: Just went for breakfast before a presentation for Palmera Vacations.

name: Elisa Stanley
text: Fun environment and yummy food

name: NightBot
text: Gucci food and I didn't have to go to popeyes that's a plus.

name: Jason Kurtz
text: One of the very few places we could find that serves food after 10pm. The bartender was great too; unrushed, but attentive, and he knew his beer. There were very few people when we visited and it still managed to feel cozy and familiar. The food was outstanding as well

name: Tiffany Williams
text: Love their calzones. Enough for 2 people or just 2 meals.

name: Lane Taylor
text: I came here for the vegan options. The food was good, and the portions were large. The staff are helpful and nice. The washrooms are binary gendered and not single stall but are private. There was a bit of a wait, but not too long. It was ‚Ä¶More

name: James Lochner
text: Sitting in the trolley was so fun for my kids.

name: WhiteDwarf
text: Great server Kathy, all around nice time.

name: Robert Carpenter
text: The food  the service and atmosphere was awsome. A great place to eat.

name: christopher conner
text:
Well, really don't know if I can give an honest review all I know my and the rest if the family went (9of us).
Waited 35 minutes nobody asked us nothing. We asked 2 different times to be ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Angelicola
text: Fabulous! We walked in at 11 PM and we greeted by a friendly chap who catered to our every request. The food was very tasty. The baked chicken wings were spectacular, prepared with  tender loving care. I especially loved the naked wings, tender and scrumptious. Go! You'll love it from your head to your toes.

name: Todd Melby
text: Service was not great.

name: CCC PowerOf3s
text: Loved the pizza here, BEST sangria on the island. Great tunes, mellow environment, didn't care for the wait staff. Although it was busy, we sat outside to avoid a long wait. Never got offered a citronella candle, but the table behind us did as we were paying our bill...figures.

name: Chris Harbinson
text: Great food & atmosphere

name: Jeff Gale
text: This is definitely one of our local spots for great food, craft beer and atmosphere. They are very consistent and offer great quality pizza. We always bring our out of town visitors here

name: Rene' Paul Romagosa
text: Very popular, very good pizza. Service depends on day.

name: Hunter James
text: Wow!! Excellent service the whole night and my wife and I loved our server! He was so engaging the whole time and really took an interest in our lives. I recommend this place to anyone looking to have a good time! I'll be back soon!

name: Isis Tiell
text: Always a pleasure the staff is delightful. They go above and beyond to meet your needs. The food is absolutely wonderful and they are even open later than most places which is a huge perk in my book.

name: Nora Harvey
text: The pizza was awesome

name: Derrick Craig
text: Great places I come back again

name: Julie Dillon
text: Best pizza we have EVER had anywhere in U.S. great atmosphere

name: Jason Cox
text: Good food, friendly staff, and a fun atmosphere.

name: W. Joshua Fuoco
text: Good pizza, accommodated a large group well. Our server was great, took care of our large group with young kids well. Fun atmosphere, good pizza. Kitchen had a couple issues in getting food out quickly and the manager pre-empted any frustrations by coming out and giving us a discount. Enjoyed our evening.

name: Cloud 9 Vapor Lounge
text: The food is excellent and the staff even better!!! I visit frequently and always enjoy my meal and the atmosphere as well as the service provided. I love the atmosphere and music and there's a nice outdoor patio area on a comfortable day!!

name: Michael Fink
text: We had a large party and everyone ordered pizza and drinks. The service was decent.

name: Susan Ochsner
text: Very friendly staff, even the ones that are in  training. I regularly go in and eat an avocado hoagie, my favorite. The pizza slices and pretzels are also yummy. Great LUNCH specials! Don't miss them.

name: Terry Loughman
text: Great service. Food was awesome. Beer selections were amazing ! ( and wife loved their margarita !! )

name: John Glennon
text: Best dang pizza.

name: Mary Smith
text: Awesome Pizza and Great atmosphere

name: James Jarmusch
text: We went with a party of six with an age range from 15 to 60. Everyone enjoyed the evening. Our server/waiter/attendant was Dave. You should ask for him if you want a warm, enjoyable, and entertaining experience. He told us what to avoid, ‚Ä¶More

name: The Flying Spaghetti Monster
text: Best food and service

name: Marlon Garcia
text: So far all I have to say is good things about this place

name: Lynne Cohen
text: Mellow Mushroom in Bluffton had a great menu for our vegan friends, as well as good choices for the rest of us. Our young server was very friendly and knowledgeable, and as he was also vegan, he was able to answer all of our friends' questions. Food was good and filling.

name: Kale'a Plassart
text:
Good pizza, vegan cheese.
Cool decorations, reminds me of a roller rink.
Fast service, good music, not too loud

name: Michael Hatfield
text: One of the waitresses was bossy and needs an intervention. The initial waitress was good.

name: Brooks King
text: Pizza is bangin' and the beer is affordable. I reccomend a mushroom and pepperoni. Very chill and indees mellow armosphere with friendly bar tenders.

name: Juan Solomon
text: Service and food were just right!

name: Kyle Kenney
text: Great pizza and atmosphere

name: Ben Sargent
text: We waited for a table for 30 minutes only to find that half the restaurant was empty. The waitress asked put drink order before we had a chance to even glance at the menu. They ran out of silverware but had brought us salads, so we had to ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Hattersley
text: Service was unfortunately bad.  I know everyone has a bad night, but we felt like they didnt want to be bothered by our party

name: Jill Jauch
text: Can't get enough of the pretzels and beer cheese! And the spinach salad is so delicious...full of various textures and so tasty with their special Esperanza dressing. And I haven't even mentioned the pizza! Great crust and sauce. Groovy, psychedelic atmosphere right outside the gates of Sea Pines.
